医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
功能性食品的未来：利用铁皮石斛实现最佳肠道健康和疾病预防铁皮石斛多糖 (DOP) 的结构、提取、保健功效和机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/The-future-of-function-foods-Leveraging-Dendrobium-officinale-for-optimal-gut-health-and-disease-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/The-future-of-function-foods-Leveraging-Dendrobium-officinale-for-optimal-gut-health-and-disease-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82976272-87dd-4672-83d0-0a59852fec38 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 04:37:00 -0500 The future of functional foods: Leveraging Dendrobium officinale for optimal gut health and disease prevention
新进化理论提出，发酵食品可能促进了人类大脑的生长《通讯生物学》评论表明，食物的外部发酵可能在原始人类大脑的扩张中发挥了关键作用。 “外部发酵假说”认为，早期人类在外部发酵食物的做法有助于大脑生长和肠道缩小，为人类进化和饮食习惯提供了新的视角。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Fermented-foods-may-have-fueled- human-brain-growth-new-evolutionary-theory-proposes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Fermented-foods-may-have-fueled- human-brain-growth-new-evolutionary-theory-proposes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4bb9629-9840-4e1f-8a44-3761e080bf2e Sun, 26 Nov 2023 22:53:00 -0500 Fermented foods may have fueled human brain growth, new evolutionary theory proposes
研究发现吸食大麻与其他物质使用增加有关简短的交流文件探讨了大麻电子烟与其他物质的使用之间的联系，将大麻电子烟使用者与不电子烟大麻使用者进行了比较。研究表明，大麻电子烟使用者更有可能使用酒精、烟草和非法药物等其他物质，尤其是在年轻人中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Cannabis-vaping-linked-to-increased-use-of-other-substances-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Cannabis-vaping-linked-to-increased-use-of-other-substances-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e0d17b-737b-4343-9f72-dc1e18e99a2a Sun, 26 Nov 2023 22:36:00 -0500 Cannabis vaping linked to increased use of other substances, study finds
驾驭气候动态：流行病学模型研究欧洲气温变化对死亡率的影响研究评估了使用每周和每月汇总数据而不是每日记录来估计欧洲温度与死亡率关系的效果。研究发现，虽然这些汇总模型捕捉了主要趋势，但它们往往低估了极端温度的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Navigating-climate-dynamics-Epidemiological-modeling-examines-the-mortality-impact-of-variable-Temperatures-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Navigating-climate-dynamics-Epidemiological-modeling-examines-the-mortality-impact-of-variable-temporals-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d63987a-8631-440b-8ad9-e5a30a1996fe Sun, 26 Nov 2023 22:13:00 -0500 Navigating climate dynamics: Epidemiological modeling examines the mortality impact of variable temperatures in Europe
新研究发现无纤维饮食是治疗儿童克罗恩病的关键研究揭示了独家肠内营养 (EEN) 中的无纤维饮食如何通过影响肠道致病菌 Mucispirillum schaedleri 来帮助治疗儿童克罗恩病。它表明这种饮食会改变肠道微生物群，降低粘螺菌的致病性并有助于控制结肠炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Fiber-free-diet-key-to-treating-childhood-Crohns-disease-new-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Fiber-free-diet-key-to-treating-childhood-Crohns-disease-new-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b01ece-669a-46fd-84d3-5e28659a4d8d Sun, 26 Nov 2023 22:04:00 -0500 Fiber-free diet key to treating childhood Crohn's disease, new study finds
社区声音重新定义福祉：安大略省研究强调居民的优先事项PLOS One 的这项研究探讨了加拿大安大略省的社区成员如何定义福祉以及他们的意见对有效决策的重要性。通过焦点小组研究，研究发现福祉包括便利设施、可达性和社区参与，重点是避免整体社区健康的边缘化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Community-voices-redefine-well-being-Ontario-study-highlights-residents-priorities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Community-voices-redefine-well-being-Ontario-study-highlights-residents-priorities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3472b87-b8cf-45fe-b45f-d78007aeb3db Sun, 26 Nov 2023 20:39:00 -0500 Community voices redefine well-being: Ontario study highlights residents' priorities
免疫力大餐：研究强调食物可以增强身体的防御能力研究回顾了某些食物（包括水果、蔬菜、香料和动物产品）如何增强免疫系统。它详细介绍了各种食物的增强免疫力的特性，并强调了营养饮食在疾病预防和管理中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Feasting-for-immunity-Study-highlights-foods-that-bolster-your-bodys-defenses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Feasting-for-immunity-Study-highlights-foods-that-bolster-your-bodys-defenses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47db1211-69b0-4a38-b5eb-5f4ea1b0d600 Sun, 26 Nov 2023 20:08:00 -0500 Feasting for immunity: Study highlights foods that bolster your body's defenses
德国通过含糖饮料税可能节省数十亿美元并带来健康收益《公共科学图书馆医学》杂志最近的一项研究调查了德国含糖饮料 (SSB) 税收的潜在影响。研究表明，对 SSB 征收 20% 的税可能会减少糖的消耗，带来显着的健康益处，并节省大量的社会成本，特别是当扩展到包括果汁时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Germanys-potial-billions-in- savings-and-health-gains-with-sugar-sweetened-beverage-tax.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Germanys-potial-billions-in- savings-and-health-gains-with-sugar-sweetened-beverage-tax.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8e68e7c-dac4-4bc2-abdc-5a54c708ed5a Sun, 26 Nov 2023 19:48:00 -0500 Germany's potential billions in savings and health gains with sugar-sweetened beverage tax
多成分草药补充剂可提高老年人的认知速度和肠道健康在一项针对主观记忆衰退的老年患者的研究中，90 天的草药补充剂疗法提高了认知任务速度并改变了肠道微生物群，尽管会导致记忆缺陷。这种干预增加了尿酪氨酸水平，表明多巴胺能活性在认知增强中发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Multi-ingredient-herbal-supplement-boosts-cognitive-speed-and-gut-health-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Multi-ingredient-herbal-supplement-boosts-cognitive-speed-and-gut-health-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c48967e-d710-4b56-909c-f804ab8c03e2 Sun, 26 Nov 2023 19:35:00 -0500 Multi-ingredient herbal supplement boosts cognitive speed and gut health in seniors
研究确定了肥胖和非肥胖个体脂肪肝疾病早期检测的关键标志物在《科学报告》上发表的一项研究中，研究人员发现，胰岛素抵抗标记物 TyG-BMI 和 HOMA-IR 分别可以有效预测非肥胖和未患糖尿病的肥胖个体的非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFLD) 风险。这些发现提出了早期 NAFLD 检测的新的非侵入性方法，特别是在非典型非肥胖病例中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Study-identizes-key-markers-for-early-detection-of-fatty-liver-disease-in-obese-and-non-obese-individuals。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Study-identizes-key-markers-for-early-detection-of-fatty-liver-disease-in-obese-and-non-obese-individuals。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=967f6957-6d41-4b56-b72c-b241facf1577 Sun, 26 Nov 2023 17:38:00 -0500 Study identifies key markers for early detection of fatty liver disease in obese and non-obese individuals
